TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ConcurrentBag`1<T> extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.Concurrent.IProducerConsumerCollection`1<!T>, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<!T>, class System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyCollection`1<!T>, class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public Class ConcurrentBag(Of T) Implements ICollection, IEnumerable(Of T), IProducerConsumerCollection(Of T), IReadOnlyCollection(Of T)

generic <typename T> public ref class ConcurrentBag : System::Collections::Concurrent::IProducerConsumerCollection<T>, System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<T>, System::Collections::Generic::IReadOnlyCollection<T>, System::Collections::ICollection
type ConcurrentBag<'T> = class interface IProducerConsumerCollection<'T> interface IReadOnlyCollection<'T> interface seq<'T> interface IEnumerable interface ICollection

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 要儲存在集合中的項目型別。

span.span: The type of the elements to be stored in the collection.

summary.span: 表示安全執行緒的未排序物件集合。

span.span: Represents a thread-safe, unordered collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包是適用於儲存物件，當順序並不重要，且不同於集，包支援重複的項目。Bags are useful for storing objects when ordering doesn't matter, and unlike sets, bags support duplicates. 是安全執行緒包實作，適用於案例，其中要同時產生並取用儲存封包中的資料相同的執行緒。 is a thread-safe bag implementation, optimized for scenarios where the same thread will be both producing and consuming data stored in the bag. 接受`null`為參考類型的有效值。 accepts `null` as a valid value for reference types. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱文章[常見問題集： 是的新並行集合所有無鎖定？](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/pfxteam/archive/2010/01/26/9953725.aspx)中平行程式設計與.NET 部落格。For more information, see the entry [FAQ: Are all of the new concurrent collections lock-free?](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/pfxteam/archive/2010/01/26/9953725.aspx) in the Parallel Programming with .NET blog. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何新增和移除項目:The following example shows how to add and remove items from a : [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentBag#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.concurrent.concurrentbag/cs/concbag.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentBag#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.concurrent.concurrentbag/vb/concbag.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 所有 public 和 protected 成員是安全執行緒，且可能會從多個執行緒同時使用。

span.span: All public and protected members of are thread-safe and may be used concurrently from multiple threads.

threadsafe.span: 不過，透過其中一個介面存取成員實作，包括擴充方法，不保證是安全執行緒，而且可能需要由呼叫端進行同步處理。

span.span: However, members accessed through one of the interfaces the implements, including extension methods, are not guaranteed to be thread safe and may need to be synchronized by the caller.
Thread-Safe Collections

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Count As Integer
public: property int Count { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得 中所包含的元素數。

span.span: Gets the number of elements contained in the .
The number of elements contained in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回的計數表示目前時間的快照集的封包內容。The count returned represents a moment-in-time snapshot of the contents of the bag. 可能是其他執行緒可能會新增或移除項目，只有在您存取之後，立即`Count`屬性。It is possible that other threads might add or remove items immediately after you access the `Count` property.

span.span: Thread-Safe Collections

summary.span: 傳回在 中逐一查看的列舉值。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the .
An enumerator for the contents of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列舉代表目前的時間快照的封包的內容。The enumeration represents a moment-in-time snapshot of the contents of the bag. 它不會反映任何更新之後，集合呼叫。It does not reflect any updates to the collection after was called. 列舉值安全地使用同時讀取和寫入封包。The enumerator is safe to use concurrently with reads from and writes to the bag.

span.span: Thread-Safe Collections
